name: undyed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
natural, without the colour having been changed using a special liquid: Like her undyed hair, there's something very honest and exposed about her music. She began a business importing the natural, undyed wool carpets of Tunisia.
More examplesFewer examplesThe T-shirts are made from unbleached, undyed, environment-friendly cotton.The undyed haddock is sliced into thin flakes, but left raw.Grey and brown are obtained either by using undyed wool or by dyeing the yarns with extracts from nutshells and oak bark.
